root.name: Yoostar on MTV
root.description: OverviewLike previous Yoostar games, players act out scenes and deliver lines while being tracked by the Kinect. Instead of scenes from famous films, as in previous Yoostar games, Yoostar on MTV offers clips from certain MTV programs like Jersey Shore, Human Giant, and Pimp My Ride, plus a smaller selection of music videos by 50 Cent, Far East Movement, and others.
